English: lit. look into one's heart, no shame (idiom); with a clear conscience
francais: (expr. idiom.) n'avoir pas honte en regardant dans son coeur

d.f: `憑著~`良心~`自我反省~，`無~`絲毫~`慚愧~`不安~。

English: lit. look into one's heart, no shame (idiom); with a clear conscience
